casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jarvis Deon MASSEY. No. 592P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, Amanda S. Zimmer, for Massey. Iain Stauffer, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 635 S.E.2d 528 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th day of November 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th day of January 2007."
